name.title: Software Software Engineer | Optimization & Deep Reinforcement Learning Researchers

bio_short: PhD researcher in Computer Science and Technology focused on Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL) for financial systems; Senior Software Engineer building production SaaS.
bio:
I am pursuing a Doctor of Philosophy (PhD) in Computer Science and Technology at Xidian University (XDU), specializing in Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL) for Financial Systems. My research focuses on integrating DRL in financial modeling and real-time market adaptation.

As well as, I'm demonstrating leadership at Autofficina Internazionale s.a.s (InternazionaleAuto), contributing to vehicle automation system development and project management. With over five years of professional experience as a Senior Software Engineer and a strong academic background in Machine Learning (ML), Deep Learning (DL), and DRL, I am also exploring research in the FinTech field. My current project, Financial Deep Reinforcement Learning (FinDRL), is funded by the National Key Laboratory “Institute of Big Data and Visual Intelligence.”
